Audio.Locality: Serra do Mar State Park. Cunha
Audio.Author: Antonio Silveira
Audio.Comments: Territorial singing. Several males singing in the valley in the middle of the Atlantic Forest. This sound was taken of the video made by us. This is the first recorded voice for the region. see note in http://www.aultimaarcadenoe.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/PrimeiroregistrodocTijucaatra-NCunha-AS-Arca_2.pdf. bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
